content: Any one working on a distribution? Any valuable experience or code to share? I'm investigating on it and only have drupal7 distributions to look at. Thanks.
I am currently spinning up sites with install profile, a default set of modules, and a pre-configured database. But, I've not technically tried to set up a distribution with Backdrop CMS>

No, but my plans are to do so...
